trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> controls.

The WebZoneDesigner class is the abstract base class for both <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, which all the other zone designers inherit from.

By inheriting directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, it allows implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method that do not automatically clear the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection, thus enabling the designer to render exceptions from child controls.
Like other designers in this namespace, WebZoneDesigner overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to always return `true`.
Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
